When the third angel's message closes, mercy no longer pleads for the guilty inhabitants of the earth. The people of God have accomplished their work. They have received \93the latter rain,\94 \93the refreshing from the presence of the Lord,\94 and they are prepared for the trying hour before them. Angels are hastening to and fro in Heaven. An angel returning from the earth announces that his work is done; the final test has been brought upon the world, and all who have proved themselves loyal to the divine precepts have received \93the seal of the living God.\94 [SEE APPENDIX, NOTE 13.] Then Jesus ceases his intercession in the sanctuary above. He lifts his hands, and with a loud voice says, \93It is done;\94 and all the angelic host lay off their crowns as he makes the solemn announcement: \93He that is unjust, let him be unjust still; and he which is filthy, let him be filthy still; and he that is righteous, let him be righteous still; and he that is holy, let him be holy still.\94 [Revelation 22:11.] Every case has been decided for life or death. Christ has made the atonement for his people, and blotted out their sins. The number of his subjects is made up; \93the kingdom and dominion, and the greatness of the kingdom under the whole heaven,\94 is about to be given to the heirs of

salvation, and Jesus is to reign as King of kings, and Lord of lords.
